roleset.name: signify, distinguished

example.name: mark-v: transitive
example.text: Gulf Power's guilty plea before U.S. District Judge Robert L. Vining yesterday marks the end of only one part of a wide-ranging inquiry of Southern Co.
example.arg: Gulf Power's guilty plea before U.S. District Judge Robert L. Vining
the end of only one part of a wide-ranging inquiry of Southern Co.

example.name: marked-j: arg 1 only
example.text: Calcific atheromatous plaque is most marked at the bifurcation.

example.name: marked-j: With arg 0 as signifier
example.text: IGF-1 longevity is marked by reduced protein metabolism

roleset.note: MARK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mark' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry image_impression-25.1, other framed members include sign. Comparison with 'notch' and 'draw'. (from mark.01-v predicate notes)
MARKED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to mark.01. Mark.01 is a member of VN class appoint-29.1. Framed by Katie. (from marked.01-j)

roleset.name: make a mark

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: President Vladimir Putin of Russia marked the new year Sunday and his first anniversary in office with an address urging Russians to be heartened by the country 's progress , despite the war in Chechnya and the sinking of the nuclear submarine Kursk .
example.arg: the new year Sunday and his first anniversary in office
with an address urging Russians to be heartened by the country 's progress , despite the war in Chechnya and the sinking of the nuclear submarine Kursk

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The composite portrait that emerges is n't of a pampered jock marking time until he can land a seven - figure pro contract -- he 's part of a tiny minority .
example.arg: until he can land a seven - figure pro contract

example.name: mark-n: arg0, LVB
example.text: The SEC has only about 200 staffers assigned to keep tabs on investment advisers -- about the same as in 1980 -- even though the number of advisers has tripled to about 15,000 over the past decade .

example.name: marking-n: with arg 1
example.text: He didn't like her marking of an 'X' on the map because it ruined the way the page looked.

roleset.note: MARK-V NOTES: I'll leave the arg3 to your imagination. (from mark.02-v)
MARK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on LVB-ON. (from mark.01-n)
MARKING-N NOTES: Comparison to mark-v. Mark is a member of VN class image_impression-25.1. Framed by Katie. (from marking.01-n)

example.name: mark_up-v: PAS!
example.text: Our hard-working team of annotators is marking up the Wall Street Journal with semantic roles.

roleset.name: raise the price

example.name: mark_up-v: transitive
example.text: ``On occasion, he paid a high price,'' Mr. Wachter concedes, but he says those who bid less and dropped out were dealers who would then have marked up the paintings to resell them at a profit to collectors.
example.arg: to resell them at a profit to collectors.

roleset.note: MARK_UP-V NOTES: Might need other args for "amount price changed by" or "final price"or "original price" depending on what examples appear. If you findsuch an example, send it to me. (from mark.04-v)

roleset.name: lower the price

example.name: mark_down-v
example.text: June, an owner of a coffee stand, marked down the price of a latte between 7:00 A.M. and 8:00 A.M. from $2.00 a cup.
example.arg: June, an owner of a coffee stand,

roleset.note: MARK_DOWN-V NOTES: See "mark up" above. (from mark.05-v)
